did.unittitle: Company House Organs and Union Journal Content Study Files, 1955
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This collection contains the working papers of a study conducted for the Council for the Advancement of Secondary Education. The purpose of the study was to determine what economic terms a high school student would need to know upon graduation. As Cornell's part, economic terms in 15 company house organs and 15 union journals were counted.

controlaccess.corpname: Council for the Advancement of Secondary Education.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Company House Organs and Union Journal Content Study Files #/3084. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Papers collected for a study conducted for the Council for the Advancement of Secondary Education on the economic content of company house organs and union journals.
